channel.title: Having a Problem Connecting to a server im hosting on the internet
channel.description: [font=Verdana][b]I have done everything correctly to run a server that i downloaded the problem i have is that i cant route people to my ip becase the neighbor lets me use his wirless and his firewall settings are locked so i cant make it so people go to my ip becase there going to his ip so therefore i cant run my server online, only on lan. if there is a genious out there maybe you can help me out please also on the server i am trying to get into the quest bar area and type information about the server like admins and owners and mods if anyone knows how to do that it would be great if you could help. Or is there no way possible and i have to go buy my own internet[/b][/font]

item.title: Having a Problem Connecting to a server im hosting on the internet
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

when logging in use the ip 0.0.0.0 not ur ip

Read full topic
item.source: Having a Problem Connecting to a server im hosting on the internet

item.title: Having a Problem Connecting to a server im hosting on the internet
item.dc:creator: @T_A_G T A G
item.description:
@T_A_G wrote:

Just go to firewall settings on neighbors make a new port called Private Server and 43594 for the 2nd and check TCP and download a no-ip domain host and run the server.

Read full topic
item.source: Having a Problem Connecting to a server im hosting on the internet

item.title: Having a Problem Connecting to a server im hosting on the internet
item.dc:creator: @p_a_r_t_y_b_o_y p a r t y b o y
item.description:
@p_a_r_t_y_b_o_y wrote:

lol i went the retarted rich kid way. I just deleted the firewall on my computer rofl! and now it works!

item.title: Having a Problem Connecting to a server im hosting on the internet
item.dc:creator: @HiddenPker HiddenPker
item.description:
@HiddenPker wrote:

Honor Swords:

[font=Verdana]I have done everything correctly to run a server that i downloaded the problem i have is that i cant route people to my ip becase the neighbor lets me use his wirless and his firewall settings are locked so i cant make it so people go to my ip becase there going to his ip so therefore i cant run my server online, only on lan. if there is a genious out there maybe you can help me out please also on the server i am trying to get into the quest bar area and type information about the server like admins and owners and mods if anyone knows how to do that it would be great if you could help. Or is there no way possible and i have to go buy my own internet[/font]

o.k lool first of all you cant portforward with wireless you need a router or LAN network if you want people to come online your server then i recommend hamachi, to download this programme go to https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/list.asp

Read full topic
item.source: Having a Problem Connecting to a server im hosting on the internet

item.title: Having a Problem Connecting to a server im hosting on the internet
item.dc:creator: @milomakes milomakes
item.description:
@milomakes wrote:

all you need to do is open 43594 (default port) to his router (if you know the pass to get in) then add it. get no-ip start it up then your done.

Read full topic

item.title: Having a Problem Connecting to a server im hosting on the internet
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Baker Mod Baker
item.description:
@Mod_Baker wrote:

Wow you really dont understand.
if the port is open on the router, and no-ip is on, poeple can connect.

Read full topic

item.title: Having a Problem Connecting to a server im hosting on the internet
item.dc:creator: @Honor_Swords Honor Swords
item.description:
@Honor_Swords wrote:

no no no its not my ip becase its not my internet so when i use no-ip its my ip but im connected to his ip so when i do all the stuff for 43594 and everything it wont work case my internet connection says his ip and my ip is diffrent on no-ip.com

Read full topic

item.title: Having a Problem Connecting to a server im hosting on the internet
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Baker Mod Baker
item.description:
@Mod_Baker wrote:

Wow why the red font and i dont really understand what youre saying but ill try to help.
Maker sure the port 43594 is open (http://portforward.com/)
Use no-ip

Read full topic
